if(NOT DEFINED CONFIG_64BIT)
  picolibc_sources_flags("-fno-builtin"
    memcmp-bs-norm.S
    memcmp.S
    memcmp-stub.c
    memcpy-archs.S
    memcpy-bs.S
    memcpy.S
    memcpy-stub.c
    memset-archs.S
    memset-bs.S
    memset.S
    memset-stub.c
    setjmp.S
    strchr-bs-norm.S
    strchr-bs.S
    strchr.S
    strchr-stub.c
    strcmp-archs.S
    strcmp.S
    strcmp-stub.c
    strcpy-bs-arc600.S
    strcpy-bs.S
    strcpy.S
    strcpy-stub.c
    strlen-bs-norm.S
    strlen-bs.S
    strlen.S
    strlen-stub.c
    strncpy-bs.S
    strncpy.S
    strncpy-stub.c
    )
endif()
